about_the_game:
[Demo Version Announcement]

Hello!
We are excited to announce that the demo version of Skeldungeon is now available for free! In this demo.
you can experience a total of 3 main stages.
We would greatly appreciate your support in promoting and cheering for us,
so that many players can enjoy the full version after trying out the demo!

[Real-Time Strategy Defense]

Skel dungeon is a real-time strategy defense game.
Control the Skel to set up traps and defeat the heroes yourself.

[Setting Trap]

At night, you can manage the dungeon.
Place traps where heroes are likely to invade to prepare for their assault.
Set up and upgrade trap rooms and expand your dungeon.
Discover various artifacts and find hidden combination rooms with new effects.

[Skel's Transformation & Combat]

During the day, you must control the Skel to directly engage in combat against incoming heroes.
Steal heroes' heads and use their abilities.
Use various transformations such as swords, magic, shields, and throwing stars to effectively defeat heroes according to the situation.

[Stage Clear]

Face increasingly stronger heroes and conquer all the stages.
The demo version includes 3 stages for you to play.

[Repeat play]

You can't resurrect the Demon Lord all at once, sacrifice heroes repeatedly.
Use the characteristic points obtained after completing stages to enhance traps and Skel, and create your own build.
Unlock new trap rooms, transformations, and skins, and play with them.
Adjust the difficulty as you like through perks and modifications, and earn bonus points.
detailed_description:
[Demo Version Announcement]

Hello!
We are excited to announce that the demo version of Skeldungeon is now available for free! In this demo.
you can experience a total of 3 main stages.
We would greatly appreciate your support in promoting and cheering for us,
so that many players can enjoy the full version after trying out the demo!

[Real-Time Strategy Defense]

Skel dungeon is a real-time strategy defense game.
Control the Skel to set up traps and defeat the heroes yourself.

[Setting Trap]

At night, you can manage the dungeon.
Place traps where heroes are likely to invade to prepare for their assault.
Set up and upgrade trap rooms and expand your dungeon.
Discover various artifacts and find hidden combination rooms with new effects.

[Skel's Transformation & Combat]

During the day, you must control the Skel to directly engage in combat against incoming heroes.
Steal heroes' heads and use their abilities.
Use various transformations such as swords, magic, shields, and throwing stars to effectively defeat heroes according to the situation.

[Stage Clear]

Face increasingly stronger heroes and conquer all the stages.
The demo version includes 3 stages for you to play.

[Repeat play]

You can't resurrect the Demon Lord all at once, sacrifice heroes repeatedly.
Use the characteristic points obtained after completing stages to enhance traps and Skel, and create your own build.
Unlock new trap rooms, transformations, and skins, and play with them.
Adjust the difficulty as you like through perks and modifications, and earn bonus points.
name: Skel Dungeon Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950, Radeon R7 360, or Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650, Radeon RX 5300
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

short_description: Skel Dungeon is a real-time strategy defense game. Become a small skeleton and defeat the heroes invading your dungeon. Set up and upgrade trap rooms, expand your dungeon, and strengthen your skeleton to stand against increasingly powerful heroes.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
